item.title: Alias Manager
item.description: Alias Manager Alias Manager is a simple command-line tool written in C for managing aliases in your shell. It supports adding, listing and removing aliases in your shell Features Add new aliases with custom commands List existing aliases Remove aliases by name Installation Clone this repository to your local machine: git clone https://github.com/kazetachinuu/alias_manager.git cd alias_manager Install the Alias Manager binary by running the install script: .
